entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
